```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(ggpubr)
```

```{r}
data<- read.csv("TemperatureData.csv")
```

```{r}
data|> ggplot(aes(x = Year,
                  y = Degrees.C)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
    stat_regline_equation(label.x = 1960,
                          label.y = 0.7)
```

```{r}
lmyear<-lm(Degrees.C~Year,
   data = data)
summary(lmyear)

```
